title: [dr-autosync]online recover failed due to one store have not reported to PD

comments_data.body:
/severity  critical
hit it again in two testing environmentsï¼Œ so mark it critical.

/remove-severity critical
/severity major
Didn't hit it recently, and based on the diagnosis, the issue is that TiKV is unable to connect to PD. In theory, it should be possible to resolve it by restarting TiKV.
So reduce the bug severity.
After the problem reproduces, further analysis will be conducted.

@mayjiang0203: These labels are not set on the issue: `severity/critical`.
